Posts.Content: Apr 9, 2012 04:55PM twinsmom96 wrote: Your not the only one that had a meltdown I did also I know in my heart my mother-in-law means well but when she started in at Easter dinner about how this food and that food which she knows I dislike prevent cancer I had had enough. I told her that telling a person with cancer how they could of prevented(not the first time she has made these comments) getting cancer was bullshit and that I better not hear that again she said oh I was just trying to help you, lets just say really wasnt pretty. But we talked sure she still doesnt get it sure I will just be the mean daughter-in-law that yelled at her but at least she knows that she made me feel like it was my fault when it is NOT.So hope everyone had a better Easter then I.

Posts.Content: Sep 26, 2011 03:12PM twinsmom96 wrote: Hi I know the feeling only had lumpectomy in 09 was told stage 1 ,in June 2011 was dx with reacurrance in breast and mets to the liver was given the same choice I chose taxol that is the one my dr liked the best ,have had 6 weekly treatments feel pretty good a little tired but can still live normal life and do everything did before, hair is just starting to fall out will probably be gone in a couple of weeks. I did have a port put in would recommend that first time around didn't have one would't do it without one this time
